I'm a Java Programmer and I have some questions about
Unit Tests. First: how can I do test code for code that access
database? The question is: put the data in a property file? This
is very expensive... It require a framework for access the data
too... In a project I see that. Make the test is expensive.
Exist a alternative? In another project I don't have used
property files. I test the method of insert using the method for
search (the data inserted is in the collection?) but I think
this is not very good... How do that so?
